summary: Implements the full tuberculosis disease and health‑system workflow within the simulation, handling infection acquisition, natural history, diagnostic screening, treatment initiation and follow‑up, preventive therapy, mortality, self‑cure, and periodic program activities such as scaling‑up and regular polling.
business_intent: Provide a comprehensive, configurable model of TB epidemiology and care pathways to support policy analysis and impact assessment of TB control interventions in a population‑level simulation.
